video.title: The Quest
video.synopsis: Reality show contestants venture to an imaginative realm and test their own heroism, with ogres and dragons standing between peace and chaos.

episodes.synopsis: Led by Crio to Castle Saenctum, the inexperienced Paladins must prove their skill with a bow and arrow -- the first of many challenges they will face.
episodes.title: The Quest Begins

episodes.synopsis: With Verlox on the move toward Saenctum, the Paladins must demonstrate their skill on horseback to win Queen Ralia's approval and avoid banishment.
episodes.title: Tournament for the Queen

episodes.synopsis: When Queen Ralia is poisoned, the Paladins face the Hag's Challenge to find the ingredients for the antidote that will save her life.
episodes.title: Save the Queen

episodes.synopsis: Sir Ansgar continues the Paladins' training by dividing them into teams and pitting them against each other in a test of strength, agility and wits.
episodes.title: Battle Dome

episodes.synopsis: After Castle Saenctum falls under attack, two teams of Paladins must each build a barricade that will withstand the force of a battering ram.
episodes.title: Under Siege

episodes.synopsis: After a traitor is captured and interrogated, the Paladins must locate seven fire orbs he has concealed around Castle Saenctum.
episodes.title: A Traitor in Sanctum

episodes.synopsis: With Verlox and his dark army advancing on Castle Saenctum, the Paladins must use abandoned signal towers deep in the forest to warn of the attack.
episodes.title: Verlox Attacks

episodes.synopsis: After a dragon released by Verlox scorches a nearby village, the Paladins must manipulate a complex mechanical device to imprison the wyrm once more.
episodes.title: The Dragon's Lair

episodes.synopsis: Betrayed and then imprisoned by mutant sea creatures known as Rana, the Paladins must escape suspended cages in time to save Queen Ralia.
episodes.title: Escape from Rana Village

episodes.synopsis: One of the remaining Paladins emerges as the One True Hero, assembles the Sunspear and faces Verlox in a final melee in Castle Saenctum.
episodes.title: One True Hero
